baseRule.text: 若比丘。瞋恨不喜掌刀擬比丘。波夜提。
baseRule.label: Classical Chinese Mahāsaṅghika Bhikkhu Pācittiya 59

fullParallels.text: Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhussa kupito anattamano talasattikaṁ uggireyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 75

translations.text: Welcher Mönch auch immer zornig und verstimmt gegen einen Mönch die Handfläche zum Schlag erhebt, muß dafür sühnen.
If a monk raises a hand in anger against a monk, he commits an offense entailing confession.
Si un bhikkhu, enfadado y descontento, levanta la mano a otro bhikkhu: [La acción] ha de ser confesada

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。瞋他比丘。恚忿不憙手搏。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 49

fullParallels.text: 若比丘瞋他舉手向。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 48

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻瞋恚故不喜。擬手向苾芻者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhu Pācittiya 49

fullParallels.text: 若比丘。瞋故以手擬比丘。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 72

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘！瞋恚不喜，以手搏比丘者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 79

translations.text: If a monk push another monk in anger, it is Pācittiya.
Jika seorang bhikṣu mencengkeram bhikṣu lain dengan tangannya karena kemarahan dan kebencian, ia melakukan sebuah pāyattika.

fullParallels.text: 若比丘瞋故不喜。以手搏比丘者波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhu Pācittiya 79

fullParallels.text: 若比丘瞋恚心以手擬比丘。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Kāśyapīya Bhikkhu Pācittiya 49

fullParallels.text: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā kupitā anattamanā talasattikaṁ uggireyya, pācittiyaṁ.
fullParallels.label: Paḷī Theravāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 153

translations.text: Welche Nonne auch immer zornig und verstimmt gegen eine Nonne die Handfläche zum Schlag erhebt, muß dafür sühnen.
Should any bhikkhuni, angered and displeased, raise her hand against a bhikkhuni, it is to be confessed.
Jika ada Bhikkhuni yang, marah dan tidak senang, mengangkat tangannya terhadap seorang Bhikkhuni, itu harus di akui.

fullParallels.text: 「若比丘尼，瞋恚故不喜，以手搏比丘尼者，波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Dharmaguptaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 63

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。瞋故以手擬比丘尼。波逸提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mahīśāsaka Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 55

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。瞋舉手向比丘尼。波夜提。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Sarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 34

fullParallels.text: 若復苾芻尼瞋恚故不喜。擬手向苾芻尼者。波逸底迦。
fullParallels.label: Classical Chinese Mūlasarvāstivāda Bhikkhunī Pācittiya 34

fullParallels.text: 若比丘尼。瞋恨不喜掌刀擬比丘尼者波夜提。
